metadata.title: WeSellPhotos Max Ehrmann Poem “Desiderata” | Motivational Poster, Print, Picture or Framed Wall Art Decor - Inspirational Poems Collection - Holidays (13x19 Unframed Poster)
features: Inspirational & Motivational Poems and Quotes by Max Ehrmann: Desiderata

The Perfect Gift: Our motivational famous poems and quotes are the perfect gift to students, friends, colleagues and loved ones. They make for an excellent gift on any occasion such as Holidays, Christmas, and Birthdays

Elegant Black Wood Frames: Our framed wall art is made using high grade wooden material elegantly designed to fit each print perfectly; With simple yet elegant background providing daily inspiration and encouragement, these famous inspirational and motivational poems and quotes will brighten up your home or office

High Quality Prints: Our pictures and posters are professionally printed on a heavy 10 mil semi-gloss paper that is tear and curl resistant; They are acid free and will not yellow or crumble over time; Your picture or poster will arrive in a large stay flat envelope inside of a plastic sleeve and will be in perfect condition ready to be framed or put directly on the wall

Multiple Print Sizes and Frames: 8x10 Unframed Photo, 8x10 Framed Photo, 13x19 Unframed Poster, 11x13 Matted to 8x10 Framed, 19X25 Double Matted to 13x19 Framed; Simply click the product you prefer to see an example
description: Framed Wall Art, Poster, Photo or Picture | Motivational, Inspirational and Famous Poems and Quotes

This beautiful 13x19 poster is the perfect gift for everyone. Bring in a sense of positivity and encouragement to everyone in the room with this inspirational and motivational wall art designed with elegant and brilliant background. Works great as room, office or school decor. We generally ship within 1-2 business days.
Exclusive WeSellPhotos Product, Made in the USA, Preassembled and Ready To Hang
